commands.title: Vani: Run Agent in All Folders

vaniAgent.pythonPath.description: Python executable to use to run the agent (e.g. python3 or path to interpreter).

vaniAgent.agentPath.description: Path to the agent script relative to the workspace root.

vaniAgent.openaiKey.description: Optional: provide your OPENAI_API_KEY here to run the agent from the integrated terminal or Output panel. For better security, set this in your OS environment or use a secret manager.

vaniAgent.runInTerminal.description: If true, run the agent in the integrated Terminal. If false, run it as a spawned process and stream logs to the Output panel.

vaniAgent.autoInstallDeps.description: Automatically install Python dependencies from requirements.txt if soundfile/sounddevice/numpy are missing before starting the agent.
